content: From attending the summer courses at Porto Business School as a teenager to being invited as a speaker just a year out of college, how cool is this? 👩‍🏫 I was so excited when Rui Mendes challenged me to give an inspirational talk on the first day of this year’s Innovation X Hub's AI Summer School. Reflecting on my high school self, I talked about how the twists and turns of life led me to my passion for AI and shared what I learned along the way about finding your interests and building a career that is authentic to yourself. 💫 After seeing these young boys and girls with interests ranging from arts to law, all united by their enthusiasm for AI, I was the one leaving inspired. 🤗 Innovation flourishes when diverse and passionate people get together to solve big problems, and I’m sure they’ll rock this week’s challenges! …more
